channel.title: Seight Custom Cycling Wear: Popular Products
channel.description: A list of the popular products at Seight Custom Cycling Wear.

item.title: Seight Custom Bib Shorts
item.description:
If you are looking for a great entry-level bib shorts, the Seight Bib Shorts are exactly what you need. They are a modern and comfy cycling apparel that gives you great value for your money, and are well designed to fit both men and women riders.

..

Price: $85.45
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Seight Custom Elite Bib Shorts
item.description:
Are you a long distance rider? Then the Seight Elite Bib Shorts are perfect for you. They are made with high quality lycra fabrics to ensure breathability and enhanced comfort. Its Flatlock style stitching produces gentle seams resulting to smooth cycling, and th..

item.title: Seight Custom Elite Winter Bib Shorts
item.description:

item.title: Seight Custom Elite Pro Bib Shorts
item.description:
Perfect, immaculate, and incredible - is what best describes the Seight Elite Bib Shorts. It is indeed the top pro bib shorts ever made, bar none! The sublimated panel is made with 240gsm Lycra from Italy, while the unsublimated panel is 225gsm, whic..

Price: $137.27
item.content:encoded:
